description: ​Transport for London, the city's public transportation agency, revealed today that its staff has limited access to systems and email due to measures implemented in response to a Sunday cyberattack. [...]
title: Transport for London staff faces systems disruptions after cyberattack

description: American car rental giant Avis disclosed a data breach after attackers breached one of its business applications last month and stole customer personal information. [...]
title: Car rental giant Avis discloses data breach impacting customers

description: ​After Office 2024 launches in October, Microsoft will disable ActiveX controls by default in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Visio client apps. [...]
title: Microsoft Office 2024 to disable ActiveX controls by default

description: SonicWall is warning that a recently fixed access control flaw tracked as CVE-2024-40766 in SonicOS is now "potentially" exploited in attacks, urging admins to apply patches as soon as possible. [...]
title: SonicWall SSLVPN access control flaw is now exploited in attacks
